title: Problems Getting onto the client/ log on screen.
body: I cant log on to league at all sometimes, like when i get onto the log on screen after hours of waiting to get on it, it says we have restored the client to an older version then you press the okay button that it shows and a restart button comes up with a countdown so it has to restart the client, you have to wait another hour or two just to see the exact same thing... like it doesn't happen 100% of the time but when that restart button pops up, you know the pain you're about to go through... FeelsBadMan.

replies.body: Ahhhhh that dreaded patch loop. Essentially, your client hasn't been able to properly patch up so it keeps trying to redownload it. Most of the time we can get you back on the Rift by using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a **Force Repatch** but hit me back if that doesn't do the trick!
